thread.title: Police: Man threw urine in bus driver's face in New York - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8
thread.title_full: Police: Man threw urine in bus driver's face in New York - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Police: Man threw urine in bus driver's face in New York - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8
text:
NEW YORK (AP) - Police are searching for a man who they say threw urine in a bus driver's face in New York City.
Police say the suspect boarded the bus in the Bronx with a 5-year-old boy.
He got into an argument with the driver as the bus pulled up to the Pelham Bay station and allegedly threw a vial of urine at him.
Police say he then fled with the boy.
The driver suffered irritation to his face and eyes and was taken to the hospital.
